titles.title: We Want to See Jesus Lifted High

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I want to see, I want to see, I want to see Jesus lifted high!
I want to see, I want to see, I want to see Jesus lifted high!

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I want to see Jesus lifted high,
A banner that flies across the sky;
That all men might see the truth and know,
He is the way to heaven.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
We want to see, we want to see, we want to see Jesus lifted high!
We want to see, we want to see, we want to see Jesus lifted high!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Step by step we're moving forward,
Little by little we're taking ground;
Every prayer is a powerful weapon,
Strongholds come tumbling down,
And down and down and down...

verse.name: c3
verse.lines:
We're gonna see, we're gonna see, we're gonna see Jesus lifted high!
We're gonna see, we're gonna see, we're gonna see Jesus lifted high!
